about_the_game:
NothingDOG-《Love is everywhere》-Public welfare soundtrack album

About this：

Dandelions entrust their dreams to the wind, which caresses the flowers and touches the blue sky. Later they bloomed beautifully, flourishing in the mountains and seas.

NothingDOG-《Love is everywhere》-Public welfare soundtrack album to bring new dogs, each dog with a different dream, please patiently listen to the voice of the dogs.

-New DLC dogs
-DLC Pure Music Enjoyments
-NothingDOG's Blessing

-100% of the revenue from this DLC will be donated to "Left-behind children" related public welfare through authoritative charitable organizations.
